name: Elisabetta Gregoraci
birth_place: 意大利,卡拉布里亚,卡坦扎罗,Soverato
introduction: Gregoraci started her career on the Italian television show Libero as a dancer, before replacing model Eva Herzigova for the Wonderbra campaign.Gregoraci gained notoriety when it came to light that she had offered sexual favours in return for a job as a showgirl for the Italian national public television company RAI.[1][2][3] She was fired from RAI[citation needed] and hired by Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi, acting as a hostess in the show Buona Domenica.[citation needed]On 14 June 2008, Gregoraci married 58-year-old then Formula One manager Flavio Briatore, in the Santo Spirito in Sassia, Rome. The driver of the bridal car was Fernando Alonso, who after the ceremony drove the newlyweds to the reception at the castle of Torcrescenza.[4] Briatore has daughter Helena Klum Samuel with German supermodel Heidi Klum.[5] Gregoraci gave birth to their son Falco Nathan in Nice, France on 18 March 2010
